嘲哳.definition: (onom.) clamorous noise made by numerous people talking or singing, or by musical instruments, or birds twittering

嘲弄.definition: to tease; to poke fun at; to make fun of

嘲笑.definition: to jeer at; to deride; to ridicule; mockery; derision

嘲諷.definition: to sneer at; to ridicule; to taunt
